SA10bsa013_u:2_0: iha kaścit śuśrūṣamāṇaḥ śramaṇaḥ śravaṇa dhāraṇohāpohaśaktisampannaḥ śiṣya ācāryasya pāda [mūla] māgamya tathāgataśāsanamārabhya evaṃ pṛṣṭavān - bhagavan atra
SA10bsa013_u:3_1: kva teṣāṃ saṅgraha iti śrotumicchāmi / iti /
SA10bsa013_u:pshk_1_0: tasya teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tattvavubhutsāmavetya ācārya idamuktavān
SA10bsa013_u:phv_1_0: tatra daśa ca dvau ca dvādaśa /
SA10bsa013_u:phv_1_2: rathāṅgavadaṅgabhāva uktaḥ / kāyavāṅamanomaunānmuniḥ / tena muninoddiṣṭāḥ kathitāḥ prakāśitā iti paryāyāḥ /
SA10bsa013_u:phv_1_5: te dvādaśāṅgaviśeṣāḥ kleśakarmaduḥkhā anyonyaṃ pratītya naḍakalāpayogena triṣu yathāvat saṃkṣiptāḥ /
SA10bsa013_u:4_0: pṛcchati / ke punaste kleśāḥ / kiṃ karma / kiṃ duḥkham yeṣu ime pratyayaviśeṣāḥ saṅgrahaṃ gacchanti /
SA10bsa013_u:5_2: aṣṭamī tṛṣṇā, navamamupādānam ime trayaḥ kleśasaṅgṛhītāḥ pratyavagantavyāḥ /
SA10bsa013_u:6_0: karma dvitīyadaśamau ca / saṃskāro dvitīyaḥ bhavo daśamaḥ /
SA10bsa013_u:7_0: śeṣāḥ sapta ca duḥkham karmakleśasaṅgṛhītānā [maṅga] viśeṣāṇāṃ ye śeṣā[aṅga] viśeṣāḥ sapta ca te duḥkha[saṅgṛhītā] veditavyāḥ /
SA10bsa013_u:7_1: tadyathā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā jātijarāmaraṇam /
SA10bsa013_u:phv_2_0: atra ete dvādaśa dharmāḥ karmakleśaduḥkhā[khyā] veditavyāḥ /
SA10bsa013_u:phv_2_2: etāvanta eveme sūtrāntanirdiṣṭā nātaḥ paramastīti parigaṇitam /
SA10bsa013_u:8_0: pṛcchati / kleśakarmaduḥkhānā[meṣāṃ] kutaḥ kimutpadyata iti vyākhyātuṃ prārthaye / āha -
SA10bsa013_u:pshk_3_0: tribhyā bhavati dvandvam kleśākhyebhyastribhyaḥ karmākhyaṃ dvandvamutpadyate /
SA10bsa013_u:9_0: pṛcchati / atha sarvadeheśvaraḥ sattvākhyaḥ kartā / teṣu tasya kriyā kīdṛśī / āha -
SA10bsa013_u:10_0: hetuphalañca hi jagat prajñaptiṃ vihāya anyo nāsti kaścidiha sattvaḥ /
SA10bsa013_u:10_1: paramārthataḥ kalpitaḥ / kalpitaśca nāsti / kalpitamātraviṣaye(kāma) iṣṭadravyaṃ sat na yujyate /
SA10bsa013_u:pshk_4_0: pṛcchati / yadyevam, tarhi asmāllokāt kaḥ paralokaṃ saṅkrāmati /
SA10bsa013_u:pshk_4_2: atha ca śūnyebhya eva śūnyā dharmāḥ prabhavanti dharmebhyaḥ /
SA10bsa013_u:phv_4_0: ātmātmīyarahitebhyo dharmebhyaḥ kleśakarmākhyebhyaḥ pañcahetubhyaḥ śūnyebhya ātmātmīyarahitā duḥkhatayā kathitāḥ phalakalpitāḥ śūnyāḥ sapta dharmāḥ prabhavantītyarthaḥ /
SA10bsa013_u:11_0: atra svabhāvato 'nātmadharmebhya eva svabhāvato 'nātmadharmāḥ prabhavanti ityatra ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
SA10bsa013_u:12_6: śāśvata[ākhya] doṣaḥ syāt paraloke na saṅkramaḥ /
SA10bsa013_u:12_8: ahetudoṣasattvāt / yathā guruṇoccāritahetoḥ śiṣyeṇo[ccāritaḥ] sa eva anyo vā iti na nirṇetuṃ śakyate /
SA10bsa013_u:12_9: tathā maraṇacittaṃ pratītya aupapattyaṃśikaṃ cittamapi tadeva tāto 'nyadvā iti na vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA10bsa013_u:12_10: tathā / yathā pradīpātpradīpaḥ, mukhāt darpaṇe pratibimbamutpadyate /
SA10bsa013_u:12_14: te ca ta eva vā tato 'nye vā iti na jñātuṃ śakyate /
SA10bsa013_u:phv_5_3: asmāt lokātparalokaṃ na ko 'pi bhāvaḥ sūkṣmo 'pi saṅkrāmati /
SA10bsa013_u:phv_5_5: anta iti tu viparyayaḥ / tato nivartayitavyam / anityaduḥkhaśūnyānātmabhāvān na nityabhāvān vyāmuhyāt /
SA10bsa013_u:phv_5_6: asati vyāmohe na rāgaḥ / asati rāge na dveṣaḥ / asati dveṣe na karma karoti /
SA10bsa013_u:phv_5_9: asati bhave na jātiḥ / asatyāṃ jātau na kāyacittayorduḥkhaṃ bhaveta /
SA10bsa013_u:phv_5_11: ayaṃ mokṣo veditavyaḥ / evaṃ śāśvatocchedādidurdṛṣṭayo 'panītā bhavanti /
